Where you can be yourself, slip on your flip-flops and put your feet up. We‚Äôre a fun friendly community where you can enjoy your Class A Motorcoach and live the active healthy lifestyle you deserve. Lots for sale Lots for rent DISCOVER OUR Class A Motorcoach Resort in Charlotte Harbor directly on the Myakka River 3rd Best Place to Live and Play Golf Charlotte Harbor & the Gulf Islands has been named the ‚ÄúThird Best Place to Live and Play Golf in America‚Äù. Come experience the world famous 99 Holes of golf at the Rotunda. Englewood, Fla. was named ‚Äú#2 of the Top Ten emerging travel destinations in the U.S.‚Äù by TripAdvisor.com. Port Charlotte, Charlotte Harbor and Punta Gorda were rated as one of the ‚ÄúBest Places to Live & Retire in the South‚Äù by Money Magazine. A haven for outdoor enthusiasts, Charlotte Harbor & the Gulf Islands has been named one of the ‚Äú10 Greatest Places to Sail in the United States‚Äù by Sail Magazine. ‚ÄúSOMETIMES OPPORTUNITIES COME ONCE IN A LIFETIME.‚Äù MYAKKA RIVER MOTORCOACH RESORT Everyone at Myakka River Motorcoach Resort wants to welcome you to our little piece of paradise. Myakka spent millions designing and building the resort to ensure that every detail has been looked after. We had the vision to make a resort where you can be yourself, slip on your flip flops and put your feet up. A resort that was all about casual luxury and living an active healthy lifestyle. We hope you enjoy our unique vision and have a truly wonderful time here. We look forward to meeting you at our next sunset patio meet and greet! ‚ÄúSTUNNING RIVERSIDE MOTORCOACH RESORT. THEY WERE JUST AMAZING. THE PLACE IS SO FRIENDLY AND WELCOMING.‚Äù ‚ÄúThere were so many activities and so much to do. They did it right, and have kept the community smaller. It‚Äôs very down-to-earth. Everyone says hi and waves. I feel so welcome. It truly is wonderful here.‚Äù Julie Smith Jarvis Web Solutions Ltd. ‚ÄúMy husband and I have felt welcome from the moment we entered the resort. Everyone has made us feel so at home. You can see the pride in everything they do. It‚Äôs a true gem.‚Äù Sandra Whyte Jarvis Web Solutions Ltd. Renter Video of Myakka River Motorcoach Resort BECOME AN OWNER Private & unique site layouts Natural landscaping & lighting Spacious area between sites 50 or 100amp service Full WiFi and Sewer 99 exclusive sites PRIVATE & SECURE On site owners Gated and fenced Coded security gate Single access road Class-A motorcoaches only Deed-restricted community WHO WE ARE Down To Earth Casual Luxury Fun Friendly Community Personable & Genuine Amazing Location Peaceful & Quiet Active & Healthy BECOME AN OWNER Our resort is all about down to earth casual luxury, and so is our sales process. No hard sales here, just friendly folks to take you on a tour and show you the highlights. We've spent millions to make this an amazing resort, and we'd love for you to come experience it for yourself. You'll see why we say it's our little secret on the Gulf Coast! Olde Florida Motorcoach Resort - Florida RV Trade AssociationFlorida RV Trade Association android-locate arrow-right-b campground certified chevron-down chevron-left chevron-right dealer facebook file-pdf-o info-circle ios-telephone mobile-service navicon navigate new-sales pinterest search service-center services shows social-email twitter used-sales ios-arrow-thin-down ios-arrow-thin-left ios-location youtube-outline youtube instagram Join FRVTA Blog Contact Facebook Twitter Pinterest YouTube Instagram What We Do Florida RV Trade Association Menu RV Shows Dealers/Manufacturers Dealers New Sales Used Sales Manufacturers Services Campgrounds Finance Insurance Mobile Repair Rentals Service Center Storage Suppliers RV Parts Other Products FRVTA Members Dealer Compliance Education FRVTA News Knowledgebase Legislative Updates Newsletters Training What We Do Blog Olde Florida Motorcoach Resort Destinations Share on Facebook Share Share on Pinterest Share Send email Mail Print Print Olde Florida Motorcoach Resort: The Ultimate Luxury RV Destination in Southwest Florida Nestled in the heart of Southwest Florida, Olde Florida Motorcoach Resort is setting a new standard in luxury RV living. This brand-new, state-of-the-art resort offers an unparalleled blend of comfort, elegance, and convenience, making it an enticing destination for both short-term visitors and long-term owners. From the moment you arrive, it‚Äôs clear that this is no ordinary motorcoach resort‚Äîthis is an elevated experience tailored for discerning travelers. Prime Location in Southwest Florida Located in LaBelle, Florida, Olde Florida Motorcoach Resort provides access to some of Southwest Florida‚Äôs top attractions. The region is renowned for its pristine beaches, world-class dining, boutique shopping, and premier backcountry fishing. Whether you‚Äôre looking for a quiet retreat or exciting adventures, this resort places you within reach of it all. Brand-New Infrastructure for a Hassle-Free Stay One of the standout features of Olde Florida is that everything is brand new‚Äîfrom the meticulously designed motorcoach sites to the state-of-the-art infrastructure. With new power, plumbing, roads, and facilities, guests and owners can enjoy a worry-free experience in a resort built to modern standards of efficiency, reliability, and comfort. Luxury Resort Amenities That Elevate Your Stay Expansive 15,000-Square-Foot Clubhouse At the heart of the resort is a spectacular 15,000-square-foot Clubhouse, a hub for relaxation, socializing, and entertainment. Inside, guests can enjoy a game room for friendly competitions, a classic ice cream parlor, and a dining room perfect for community gatherings and special events. The Clubhouse opens directly onto FlipFlops, the resort‚Äôs poolside bar, providing a seamless transition from indoor elegance to outdoor fun. FlipFlops: Your Ultimate Poolside Retreat FlipFlops, the resort‚Äôs lively poolside bar, is a favorite gathering spot. Featuring a full food and bar menu, this waterfront venue is the perfect place to unwind, enjoy delicious meals, and catch the big game on large-screen TVs. Whether you‚Äôre sipping a handcrafted cocktail or enjoying a fresh meal, FlipFlops delivers an unforgettable experience with stunning views and laid-back luxury. Resort-Style Pool With VIP Service The luxurious resort-style pool is a haven for relaxation. Guests can recline in a poolside chaise lounge while enjoying full food and drink service. With its serene setting and attentive staff, the pool area offers a five-star resort experience tailored for ultimate comfort. VIP Concierge Services for Effortless Luxury Olde Florida Motorcoach Resort offers exclusive VIP Concierge Services to enhance every guest‚Äôs stay. Whether you need assistance with booking local experiences, organizing private events, or arranging for on-site services, the concierge team is dedicated to making your stay seamless and stress-free. Personalized recommendations, priority reservations, and customized experiences ensure that every visit is truly unforgettable. Unmatched Sports and Recreation Facilities For those who love to stay active, Olde Florida Motorcoach Resort boasts a state-of-the-art sports complex featuring 8 pickleball courts, 2 tennis courts, full-court basketball, bocce ball, horseshoes, and shuffleboard courts. Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned competitor or just looking for friendly competition, the resort‚Äôs premier sports facilities ensure there‚Äôs always something fun to do. Pet-Friendly Amenities: Two Spacious Dog Parks Olde Florida understands that pets are part of the family. That‚Äôs why the resort is 100% pet-friendly, featuring two large, well-maintained dog parks. These spaces provide a safe and enjoyable environment where furry friends can run, play, and socialize. Exclusive Ownership Opportunities & Custom Casitas For those looking to make Olde Florida their permanent getaway, the resort offers exclusive ownership opportunities. Owners have the option to add a custom casita, an additional structure designed to enhance their motorcoach lifestyle. These luxurious casitas provide: Extra air-conditioned living space for added comfort Full bedrooms, baths, kitchens, laundry, and living space Optional outdoor living and dining areas The flexibility to maintain motorcoach mobility Owning at Olde Florida means securing a home in a top-tier luxury RV resort while enjoying the best of both worlds‚Äîpermanence and freedom. High-End Construction & Expert Design Designed by a renowned development team responsible for exclusive luxury communities in Naples, Olde Florida Motorcoach Resort reflects multi-million-dollar sensibilities. Every detail, from landscaping to construction materials, has been carefully selected to withstand Florida‚Äôs unique climate and weather conditions. With its state-of-the-art infrastructure and focus on durability, this resort is built to last, making it a smart choice for long-term owners. Exciting Activities & Year-Round Entertainment Beyond its world-class amenities, Olde Florida Motorcoach Resort offers a vibrant calendar of events, entertainment, and activities. From live music nights and themed parties to fitness classes, social clubs, and seasonal festivals, there‚Äôs always something happening. Whether you prefer relaxing by the pool or engaging in community events, the resort offers a dynamic lifestyle that fosters friendships and unforgettable memories. Redefining Luxury RV Living in Florida Olde Florida Motorcoach Resort isn‚Äôt just another RV destination‚Äîit‚Äôs an entirely new standard of luxury motorcoach living. With its prime Southwest Florida location, exceptional amenities, and exclusive ownership opportunities, this resort stands out as a must-visit for discerning RV travelers. Whether you‚Äôre looking for a vacation getaway or a permanent home, Olde Florida delivers an unmatched level of comfort, elegance, and community. If you‚Äôre seeking the ultimate luxury motorcoach resort experience, Olde Florida Motorcoach Resort in LaBelle, Florida, is the place to be. Discover a new era of resort-style motorcoach living today! For more information on Olde Florida Motorcoach Resort visit their website OldeFloridaMotorcoach.com .¬† For RVing and RV Travel blogs, please visit our website blog .¬†For our upcoming RV Shows check out our Show Homepage . Please make sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel, FRVTA , for more videos on our amazing member Florida RV Resorts, State Parks, Attractions, Multi-Dealer RV Shows, and the annual Supershow! About Us ‚Äî Town & Country RV Resort Skip to the content (813) 892-1474 Dade City, Florida Tampa 81 ¬∞ f Home About About Us Our Staff Gallery Rental Details Resources Amenities Nearby Activities Resort Map Rules and Regulations Contact Book A Stay Home About About Us Our Staff Gallery Rental Details Resources Amenities Nearby Activities Resort Map Rules and Regulations Contact About Town & Country OUR RESORT About Us Town and Country RV Resort is a seasonal 55+ community located four miles north of downtown Dade City amidst the rolling hills and Spanish moss covered oaks of Western Central Florida. We made it our goal to provide an RV resort that is well-maintained, enjoyable and beautiful for our guests. Family-owned and operated 35 shaded acres of land COMMUNITY Our History The Town and Country RV Resort was built in 1986. The Hawkins family purchased the Town and Country RV Resort in 2000, and the resort continues to be family owned and operated. Our 55+ R.V. resort is situated on 35 acres, complete with a driving range and pool. We work hard every day so you can safely enjoy your retirement years. Our Staff Our Lovely RV Resort in Dade City, FL Our little spot nestled on a hill in the lovely Florida countryside will offer you days full of activities, a strong sense of community, and companionship with your neighbors. Sunshine Sunshine is a great part of our focus here; dip in our relaxing heated pool or enjoy a walk on the 35 acres. Early risers will be able to catch sights of the most amazing birds in the area. Some refer to our park as a tropical oasis. Recreational Hall Our recreational hall offers books and puzzles for some independent entertainment or our social clubs host everything from shuffleboard tournaments, bingo, euchre, bridge, to dinners and dances. The fun is all here, you decide how much to have. Animals We have 13 open space acres in the rear of the park for dog-walking or exercising. Even if you don‚Äôt own an animal, you can spend a few restful moments saying hello to Susie, Wifi, Snowy and Baby, the Town & Country feline mascots. Prime Location Located in Dade City, only 5 miles from the nearest grocery stores, antiques shops, pharmacies, shopping centers and hospitals. We offer a country, slow-paced feel but provides residents the necessary amenities close to home. Tampa is less than an hour drive and Orlando is just over an hour away. Relaxation Paradise Enjoy your days relaxing on your porch, having coffee with friends at the recreation hall, golfing at the adjacent course, walking the park grounds or shopping in downtown Dade City. We also welcome vacationing families and overnight guests on their way in and out of town. Activities We offer an on-site driving range and a place to play bocce ball or corn hole. The Park Association puts on many activities during the year, including weekly social golf tournaments, weekly bingo and poker and monthly dances. There are also shuffleboard courts, horseshoe rings, a pool table and a swimming pool. We offer a wide variety of amenities for our guests. Every single one is serviced regularly and ready for use. VIEW ALL AMENITIES Come Stay With Us All Town & Country RV sites are full hook-up and have either 30 or 50 amp service (50 amp available on all sites).  All of our sites are very spacious at 75 feet long and we have no limitations on RV length. Pull through lots in the back can house RVs pulling trailers. RENTAL DETAILS Town & Country RV Resort Town & Country RV Resort is a seasonal 55+ community located 4 miles north of downtown Dade City amidst the rolling hills of Western Central Florida. Contact Us 18005 US-301, Dade City, FL 33523 (813) 892-1474 (Main) (352) 567-7707 (Alt) E-mail us Winter and summer office hours vary. Please call for more info. Explore About Us Amenities Resort Map Gallery Nearby Activities Book a Stay ¬© 2025 TOWN & COUNTRY RV RESORT | PRIVACY | Site by Persius Drag

Stay at Olde Florida Motorcoach & RV Resort for only $899/month from now through December 2025. More sunshine. More pickleball. More time in paradise ‚Äî for less. Book your extended stay Where the Amenities Steal the Show Sparkling resort pool? Check. Courts and fields for every game? You bet. Evenings by the firepit and mornings in the sunshine? Absolutely. And we‚Äôre just getting started.. Think shady dog parks, a fully equipped fitness center, an on-site restaurant, and plenty of spaces to relax, connect, and make memories. At Olde Florida Motorcoach & RV Resort, the only thing better than our guest list is our amenity list. View our entire resort! Amenities Outdoor Theater & Playground Service Poolside Bar Amenities Pool Deck Grill Amenities Sports Courts Amenities Luxury Pool & Spa Amenities Gameroom & Clubhouse Features Paver Sites Amenities Fitness Center Dana Kolodney Guest The pool was heated and hot in a cold snap. The amenities were second to none. Has to be the nicest RV park in the nation. The staff went beyond expectations consistently. The food was good. Drinks were made to perfection. Place was spotless clean. Everyone was friendly and inviting always wanting to please. The ownership of this resort is pure class and super nice. Cant put into words how blown away we were at this 5 star resort! Dawn Plantz Guest Olde Florida RV Park is an amazing get away. Staff was really nice and staff member Tammy made us feel at home. She went above and beyond to make sure we were enjoying our stay. Pool is great and I love that there is a restaurant and ice cream shop on the property. Two dog parks but tons of doggy stations throughout the park. Gym was top notch and outdoor tvs in each cabana was a nice touch. We will definitely be back. Joseph Fletcher Guest We've been to Olde Florida RV Resort twice since their grand opening. The entire place is amazing. The amenities are top notch. The resort pool is one of the best I've ever experienced. Their workout area is so well done with all the latest equipment. There are multiple pickleball courts along with tennis and basketball courts. The entire staff is so friendly and helpful. We've been to many high end RV resorts over the years but Olde Florida RV Resort is definitely at the top of our list. We look forward to our return visit in the not to distant future. Jennifer Lan Jackson Guest It was a wonderful experience. Very nice relaxing place. Tammy, Scott, Donna, Tony, and David(security) were all awesome people. The property was very well lit and landscaping was just amazing. The dinner was great too. Bob Tuck Guest My wife and I have monitored the developement and completion of Olde Florida, always eager for a great place to visit and stay in our motorcoach. Our first stay certainly did not disappoint. The amenities and hospitality are no less than AMAZING! Wow! We are eager to return with our granddaughters for a lengthier stay. Packages That Make Every Stay Extraordinary .Your getaway should be more than just a spot to park‚Äîit should be a story worth telling. At our Motorcoach & RV Park in Florida, our exclusive packages are designed to turn your trip into a memorable chapter, whether you‚Äôre here for a special occasion, a long weekend, or a seasonal escape. From thoughtful touches to seamless service, each package is crafted to make every moment here feel just right. $75 /Night Preserve View $595 Weekly $2195 Monthly Book Now $85 /Night Lake View $725 Weekly $2995 Monthly Book Now $95 /Night Premium Water Front $775 Weekly $3195 Monthly Book Now Your Florida Getaway Starts Here ‚Äî Don‚Äôt Wait! Olde Florida is more than a getaway, it‚Äôs your front-row seat to Gulf Coast sunsets, poolside afternoons, and the kind of southern hospitality that makes you feel like a VIP from the moment you arrive. Take advantage of our limited-time rates and lock in the luxury, comfort, and adventure you deserve. Don‚Äôt wait.. the open road is calling, and the best sites won‚Äôt last. See for yourself why so many call this home. New Pickleball Courts Get in on the action! The Florida Grande has just Opened 8 New Pickleball Courts! Become An Owner Here at The Florida Grande, we offer a unique combination of class, luxury and value that you won‚Äôt find anywhere else. Hwy 80 (exit 141): Go E 15 mi on Hwy 80 (R) Get directions From $97 / night Book now View Website Previous Next How to read Good Sam Ratings The three-number rating that accompanies each campground listing in the directory gives readers an at-a-glance assessment of a campground's amenities, cleanliness and environment. All three ratings categories are measured on a scale of 1 to 10, with 10 being the best. Less than 1 percent of parks or campgrounds receive the coveted 10 | 10 | 10 rating, which indicates superior facilities that are well maintained, clean, well-appointed restrooms and a highly appealing appearance. Campgrounds are inspected annually by dedicated RVers like you. Completeness of facilities 10 10 10 The first campground rating evaluates completeness and quality of facilities. In this category we rate interior roads, sites, registration area, hookups, recreation, swimming, security, laundry, store and building maintenance. Cleanliness of restrooms and showers 10 10 10 The second rating category concerns the cleanliness and physical characteristics of toilets, walls, showers, sinks/counters/mirrors and floor. If a park achieves a full point in each of the above, it receives a star ( ), indicating exceptionally clean restrooms. Also rated are physical characteristics of restrooms, including interior construction, adequate supplies/odor free, adequate number of facilities, exterior appearance and location in relation to park spaces, and interior appearance. Visual appeal and environmental quality 10 10 10 This category addresses the park's setting and site layout, function and identification of signage, overall exterior building maintenance, noise, trash disposal, litter and debris around the grounds and sites, and appearance of grounds, sites and entrance area. What is being rated? Facility The first campground rating evaluates completeness and quality of facilities. In this category we rate interior roads, sites, registration area, hookups, recreation, swimming, security, laundry, store and building maintenance. Restrooms The second rating category concerns the cleanliness and physical characteristics of toilets, walls, showers, sinks/counters/mirrors and floor. Also rated are physical characteristics of restrooms, including interior construction, adequate supplies/odor free, adequate number of facilities, exterior appearance and location in relation to park spaces, and interior appearance. Appeal This category addresses the park's setting and site layout, function and identification of signage, overall exterior building maintenance, noise, trash disposal, litter and debris around the grounds and sites, and appearance of grounds, sites and entrance area. Show Sites What makes this park eco friendly? Good Sam recognizes Parks that are implementing "green" practices. If a park complies with 3 or more items from the following list, a special green designation will show in their listing. Non-toxic cleaning products Natural pest control (most of the time) Minimized the use of styrofoam and significantly reduce the use of plastic Landscape managers use appropriate irrigation systems and drought tolerant and indigenous plants Recycling cans for the RVers Changed light bulbs to compact fluorescent lights (CFLs) Insulated water heaters Lowered pool temperatures Installed photocells (solar) Use more fuel efficient vehicles Instead of golf carts, implemented a strategy of encouraging the use of bikes and trikes Tankless water heaters Composting What makes this park family friendly? Good Sam Camping gives special recognition to RV Parks that provide family-friendly amenities, activities and services. No age restrictions Accepts all types of family oriented RVs, including tents, tent campers, camper vans and Class B motorhomes, as well as small trailer On-site activities for children (such as board games, arcades, ring toss, badminton, recreation for adults and children like - hiking, canoeing, bicycling, fishing, boating, horseback riding. Water activities/amenities such as swim pool, lake swimming, splash-ground Is close to Things to See & Do for families such as amusement & theme parks, zoos & animal parks, national monuments, local tours Offers full restrooms and bathhouses with at least 3 toilets and showers for men and women Family focused events on-site such as weekend events geared towards family throughout the season, themed events designed for families like Halloween or Christmas in July Dedicated staff to events Pet restrictions Pet Restrictions Pet Restriction on Quantity Pet Restriction on Breed Call for more information 833-653-3352 WiFi details WiFi at Overnite Sites WiFi at Park WiFi at Park Supports Mobile Devices WiFi at Park Supports Streaming 444 Sites with WiFi Amenities Bathroom Restroom and Showers Internet and office WiFi at Overnite Sites WiFi at Park WiFi at Park Supports Mobile Devices WiFi at Park Supports Streaming 444 Sites with WiFi Dining Comp breakfast (daily) Cocktail lounge Restaurant Food Groceries Snack bar BBQ at site Table at site Entertainment DVD rentals Tour/show tickets Cable Pets Pets Pet Restriction on Quantity, Pet Restriction on Breed

For specific questions, please call, or come by our Welcome Center or you may fill out the contact information form here and we will email you a response. 5800 West State Road 80 LaBelle, FL 33935 Local: 863-674-0085 Our Welcome Center is open daily October 10 ‚Äì April 30 Monday ‚Äì Friday:¬† 8:00 am ‚Äì 5:00 pm Saturday: 9:00 am ‚Äì 3:00 pm Sunday: 9:00 am ‚Äì 1:00 pm Please call for summer hours, as these vary during off-peak season. How to Get to RiverBend Motorcoach Resort RiverBend Motorcoach Resort is conveniently located on FL-80, just west of the town of LaBelle, FL. Our resort is a quick drive from Fort Myers and you can get to Southwest Florida International Airport in about 30 minutes, or Punta Gorda Airport in about 40 minutes . You can find detailed driving instructions on Google Maps and our GPS coordinates are: N26.42.5997, W81.31.9229. From Southwest Florida International Airport/Fort Myers area: Take I-75 North 10.5 miles to FL-80 East Stay on FL-80 East/Palm Beach Blvd for 17.3 miles, toward LaBelle, FL. As you enter Hendry County, you will see the entrance to our resort on the North side of FL-80, before you reach the town of LaBelle proper.
